sentences.en: ...the chance to buy it now at a knockdown price.
Conversely, knockdown GRP 78 by sina sensitized ovarian and breast cancer cells to apoptosis.
sentences.cn: 反过来说, 击倒GRP78,由小分子干扰核糖核酸敏卵巢癌和乳腺癌细胞凋亡.

sentences.en: Fixed an issue with size modifiers affecting your attack bonus when making Knockdown attacks.
sentences.cn: 修正了拥有尺寸奖励的时候使用knockdown产生的攻击奖励的一些错误.

sentences.en: He bought the three mansions for a knockdown £7 million.
sentences.cn: 他以700万英镑的低价买了这3座大宅。

sentences.en: He gave me a real knockdown to the company.
sentences.cn: 他将我详细介绍给公司.

sentences.en: I don't know what kind of perfume she used, but it doubleproof , knockdown, render - the - victim - unconscious , moose - killing variety.
sentences.cn: 我不知道她用的是哪种香水, 但这种香水的味道非常地强烈,刺鼻、令人窒息, 简直能把人熏晕, 把驼鹿熏死.

sentences.en: The trouble is that few want to buy, despite the knockdown prices on offer.
sentences.cn: 问题是尽管要价极低，却很少有人想买。

sentences.en: Their killing effect is slightly lower, while the knockdown effect against housefly is even better.
sentences.cn: 前者的致死作用略低于后者, 而对家蝇的击倒效果却优于后者.

sentences.en: This also resulted in differentiation as expected, but with differentiation patterns similar to those seen knockdown.
sentences.cn: 它同样也会造成预期中的细胞分化, 并且分化的模式和基因抑制中观察到的类似.

sentences.en: We should buy knockdown table and chairs in the apartment.
sentences.cn: 我们住在公寓中,该实折叠式的桌椅.

words.tran_cn: 击倒的；[机]可拆卸的；廉价的

trans.tran_en: A knockdown price is much lower than it would be normally
when a boxer falls down when he is hit
